main_definition: Awesome refers to something that is extremely impressive, amazing or inspiring awe.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Extremely good or excellent in terms of quality or effectiveness.
meanings_and_examples.example: The movie received awesome reviews for its stunning visual effects and compelling story.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Inspiring a sense of wonder or amazement; something that is impressive to look at or experience.
meanings_and_examples.example: The view from the mountaintop was absolutely awesome, with sweeping vistas in every direction.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Giving one great pleasure or satisfaction; enjoyable or pleasurable.
meanings_and_examples.example: Hanging out at the beach on a sunny day feels awesomely relaxing and fun.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Admired greatly by others for being exceptional in some way.
meanings_and_examples.example: The athlete was known for his awesome performance during the game, breaking several records along the way.
